sample.controller

Class CardExchangeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.controller.CardExchangeController

  • public class CardExchangeController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for handling the cards exchange view. This class checks for cards sets from the player cards. if any set has found then it will exchange the cards for armies.
    Author:
    Team43

      • handInButtonAction

        public void handInButtonAction()
